name: Finnish Composers' Copyright Society Teosto
goal:
Teoston strategia:
- Tuotamme vain asiakasta hyödyttäviä joustavia palveluita
- Meillä on ensiluokkainen osaaminen tekijänoikeuksien digitaaliseen hallintaan muuttuvilla markkinoilla
- Luomme uuden suhteen musiikin oikeudenomistajien yhteisöön
- Järjestämme kumppanuutemme ja verkostomme uudelleen asiakkaidemme parhaaksi
- Teemme työtä uudella tavalla

In English :
Teosto collects and distributes royalties to the music authors we represent, for the public performance and mechanical reproduction of their music in Finland.

We act as a link between two customer groups, music authors on the one hand and companies and communities that use music on the other. We make life easier for users of music by providing music licences in a centralised manner at Teosto, eliminating the need to make individual agreements with each music author.

Our basic duty is to enable successful professional music-making in Finland. Part of our work involves promoting the rights of music authors and music publishers, as well as diversity in and awareness of Finnish music in Finland and abroad.
